content: *an updated version of a vintage pattern from coats & clark s archives * **yarn requirements ** coats® crème de la crème® art 149 solid color 2 5 oz 71 g 126 yd 115 m 1 ball each of 3 colors * a 117 soft ecru * b 500 aqua *or* 255 tea rose * c 307 tan additional materials yarn needle stitch markers worked in rounds of alternating colors
